allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Phases 2.4 + 4 + 5 — Error Handling, Variation Engine, Distribution Engine

Phase 2.4 — Error Handling & Rate Limits
- src/types/errors.ts: 8 categorised error classes \(RateLimit, Auth, Forbidden, etc.\)
- src/services/instagram/ErrorHandler.ts: raw-error parser, retry-delay calc, auto-pause
- src/services/instagram/RateLimiter.ts: Redis per-account quota \(hourly + daily\)

Phase 4 — Content Variation Engine
- VideoVariator: ffmpeg filter stack \(brightness/contrast/saturation/crop/speed/volume\)
- CaptionVariator: synonym swap + sentence reorder
- HashtagGenerator: niche pools + time-of-day tags + deterministic rotation
- VariationEngine: orchestrator; persists to content_variations
- REST: POST /api/variations/create|batch, GET /api/variations/:id|settings

Phase 5 — Smart Distribution Engine
- SchedulingAlgorithm: 6-h spread window, random 2–15 min gaps, peak-hour priority
- AccountSelector: health-scored selection, shuffle rotation, unavailability filter
- RiskManager: pre-flight risk score, emergency halt
- DistributionEngine: full pipeline \(risk → select → vary → schedule → queue\)
- DistributionJob: Bull queue, 3-attempt exponential backoff
- REST: POST /api/distribution/start|cancel, GET /api/distribution/:id/status

Agent Skills
- .claude/settings.json: postToolUse tsc hook, build-validate, dev-state, health-check

All code compiles with zero TypeScript errors.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -c user.email="saad@insta-distro.dev" -c user.name="Saad" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Phases 2.4 + 4 + 5 — Error Handling, Variation Engine, Distribution Engine

Phase 2.4 — Error Handling & Rate Limits
- errors.ts: 8 categorised error classes \(RateLimit, Auth, Forbidden, etc.\)
- ErrorHandler: raw-error parser, retry-delay calc, auto-pause on critical
- RateLimiter: Redis per-account quota \(hourly + daily windows\)

Phase 4 — Content Variation Engine
- VideoVariator: ffmpeg filter stack \(brightness/contrast/saturation/crop/speed/volume\)
- CaptionVariator: synonym swap + sentence reorder
- HashtagGenerator: niche pools + time-of-day tags + per-account rotation
- VariationEngine: orchestrator; persists to content_variations
- REST: POST /api/variations/create|batch, GET /api/variations/:id|settings

Phase 5 — Smart Distribution Engine
- SchedulingAlgorithm: 6-h spread, random 2-15 min gaps, peak-hour priority
- AccountSelector: health-scored selection, shuffle rotation, filter unavailable
- RiskManager: pre-flight risk score, emergency halt
- DistributionEngine: full pipeline \(risk -> select -> vary -> schedule -> queue\)
- DistributionJob: Bull queue, 3-attempt exponential backoff
- REST: POST /api/distribution/start|cancel, GET /api/distribution/:id/status

Agent Skills
- .claude/settings.json: postToolUse tsc hook, build-validate, dev-state, health-check

Zero TypeScript errors. 19 new files + 3 modified.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
